meanings.definition: The formation and development of granulocytes in the bone marrow.
meanings.sent1: Granulocytopoiesis is essential for the body's immune system.
meanings.sent2: Doctors study granulocytopoiesis to understand how white blood cells are made.
meanings.sent3: When the magician waved his wand, he joked that he was performing granulocytopoiesis on stage.
meanings.sent4: In the garden of the body, granulocytopoiesis is like the blooming of vital flowers.
meanings.sent5: The textbook vividly described granulocytopoiesis as the intricate process of creating infection-fighting cells.

meanings.definition: The process by which granulocytes are produced in the body.
meanings.sent1: Granulocytopoiesis occurs in the bone marrow.
meanings.sent3: At the science fair, the student's project humorously explained granulocytopoiesis using colorful diagrams.
meanings.sent4: In the orchestra of the body, granulocytopoiesis plays a crucial role like the percussion section.
meanings.sent5: The teacher used a fun experiment to demonstrate granulocytopoiesis to her students.
